abstract: Microsoft is moving to follow an industry trend led by Google by offering more software delivered over the Internet as a service.
snippet: Microsoft is moving to follow an industry trend led by Google by offering more software delivered over the Internet as a service.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft is moving to deliver more software technology over the Internet as a service, forced to follow an industry trend led by Google, its newest archrival.

headline.main: Storing Files on the Internet, Microsoft Style
headline.print_headline: Storing Files on the Internet, Microsoft Style

abstract: FriendFeed, created by four software designers involved in the creation of Google, aims to help people find out what Web material their friends are enjoying.
snippet: FriendFeed, created by four software designers involved in the creation of Google, aims to help people find out what Web material their friends are enjoying.
lead_paragraph: PALO ALTO, Calif., Sept. 29 — Four software designers who were instrumental in the creation of Google’s popular e-mail and mapping services have founded a new company with the intent of making it easy for people to find out what Web material their friends are enjoying.

headline.main: Service Helps Friends Share Their Online Discoveries
headline.print_headline: Service Helps Friends Share Their Online Discoveries

abstract: Under the deal, Yahoo will feature its search engine on mobile portals run by Telefónica of Spain in 15 countries in Europe and Latin America.
snippet: Under the deal, Yahoo will feature its search engine on mobile portals run by Telefónica of Spain in 15 countries in Europe and Latin America.
lead_paragraph: LONDON, Oct. 1 — Yahoo, trying to catch up with Google in the digital search and advertising businesses, said today that it had reached an agreement to feature its search engine on mobile portals run by Telefónica, the Spanish telecommunications company.

headline.main: Yahoo in 15-Nation Deal for Search on Cellphones
